comment: This course was interesting and very well organized. All my required materials were available on D2L. He spent time during and after class answering our questions. There is a lot of reading assignments though and he tests on them. I hope to take another class from him.
Dr Nelson is my favorite prof at SPSU. He made Evolution interesting. Tests were hard, but fair and he posts practice tests. Use these to get ready!
very good course and instructor. he puts lectures on D2L so I could review them. only problem was the course was at 8:30.

I am taking Nelson's on-line class and like it. He requires a lot of participation -labs due every week. Lectues and slides are very good. I like biology more than I thought I would. Study, keep up, and youll do fine. Practice tests really helped.
Very good teacher. Made the labs fun. Got to knOw us and seemed to Like us and the clAss. He made complex ideas easy.
